channel.title: kubernetes on Dan Belmonte
channel.description: Recent content in kubernetes on Dan Belmonte

item.title: Kubernetes the hard way but on-prem - part 1 (discontinued)
item.description: Disclaimer I miscalculated and after reviewing deeply the rest of the tutorial will require a deep investigation which I am not willing to do at this time. Therefore, this will be for now the only post dedicated to do it “on-prem”. This means this series is discontinued Context In order to practice for the CKA exam, it is recommended to perform the famous Kubernetes The Hard Way by Kelsey Hightower.
